column5: Looking for a good place to buy bait. Looking around Thunder Bay up HWY 17 to Upsala area.
you can do a search on: http://www.baitnet.com/search.php most all stores are listed and you can call to see if the carry minnows - not all do. phish
there are 3 shops in kakabeka falls. larrys bait is in the esso parking lot and has nice bait.
Same as fisherman10. Larry's Bait 807-473-9321 Larry's a great guy and cares about his customers. It is on the left side of the road - drive slow or you'll miss it.

There are two bait shops near Upsala. Kay's Sport and Gift Shop (807)986-2379 and Lac De Mille Bait, Tackle and Restaurant Hyw 17 (807)986-2315. You might consider taking the shortcut around Thunder Bay. https://www.walleyecentral.com/forums...ut+Thunder+Bay. You will save time and come out just before Kakabeka Falls. There's a map for the shortcut posted on the wall above the urinal in the mens restroom in the gas station at Rydens.
kays in upsala is no longer. garys truck stop at lac has minnows.
Thanks for the help! I found a place in Thunder bay. They say I can get a gallon on fatheads around 100 doz. for $160 That sound like $1.65 a doz. What does Larry get a doz. ?
For bait shops try www. thunderbayfishing.com Larry
